title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 342.7 - Retirement shall be without optional modification unless timely and effective election filed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 342.7 - Retirement shall be without optional modification unless timely and effective election filed

State Regulations

Notwithstanding any other provision of this section, but
except where payment of accumulated contributions, an ordinary death benefit, or both, is or are required pursuant to article 14 of the Retirement and Social

Security Law, retirement shall be without optional modification unless the
member files an effective election pursuant to this Part to retire on a
different basis. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
342.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
